reviewText:
As a family coach and former school teacher, I feel this product is a must have in every home and classroom.  This DVD contains some of the most powerful and effective tools in getting our children to cooperate.  The tools are practical and can be used immediately.

I have recommended all my clients to get this DVD. After getting it, they come back and thank me for making them aware of this product because the information is easy to digest and implement.

Peggy Hoime
Parent Educator
